turkish_example_sentence: Sen o pahalı yazlık evi sahip olmamışsan, tatil yapmazdın.
english_example_sentence: If you had not owned that expensive summer house, you would not have vacationed.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не владел тем дорогим летним домом, ты бы не отдыхал.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen o pahalı yazlık evi ______, tatil yapmazdın.
